name: Gambler's Earrings
description: After an opposing character is defeated: If the character this card is attached to is the active character, create Omni Element ×2.

descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opposing character is defeated:</color> If the character this card is attached to is the active character, create <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> ×2.
